textBeforeTable: Every home has that little nook that's just begging for a splash of style - one this 1 light wall sconce from the Marcele collection is happy to bring. How about over a sitting area in the bedroom? A reading alcove? Or a breakfast nook? Teardrop crystal accent adds embellishment to the delicate scroll.  This Wall Sconce from Kichler Lighting is available in an olde bronze finish. Illuminated by one 60-watt clear incandescent candelabra bulb. Available while supplies last.   Product Description Brand Manuals Reviews Dimensions Description Return Policy
